title: What is the fundamental polarity and its connection to human consciousness in Hindu teaching?
first_phrase: In the last 200 tokens of this text, the author discusses the spiritual well-being achieved by the fusion of male and female polarities in the human body, according to Hindu teachings. The male polarity is called pingala, and the female polarity is called ida. The process leads to realizing non-human consciousness modes that correspond to the seven heavens or planets, and even to the realization of metallities related to the planets, following the Hermetic tradition. Before this, the author discusses a six-fold path to spiritual well-being, including removing the anxiety caused by believing in the reality of existence and dispelling the darkness of illusion.
